trends: There have been no other sightings in Cox's Bazar
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I saw a white disk, about the size of a quarter at arms length, flying at moderate speed towards the south-east, silently, above hills. I am in Coxs Bazar, a south-east part of Bangladesh. Aprox. distance was a 3-5 kilometres, or less. Talking about it to other foreigners (from France, Canada, Nepal), they all told me it was a regular sight in the area... We are all pilots, we know what is a sattelite, a planet or a plane. This is what we can call unidentified flying object. Please do not publish this report, or my email. Take this as a statistical report...
